dcterms:description: The Weather4cast 2021 competition dataset was used to predict the time evolution of two-dimensional fields of satellite-based meteorological data, focusing on variables such as temperature, convective rainfall rate, probability of tropopause folding, and cloud mask.
dcterms:title: Weather4cast 2021 Stage 1 challenge

dcterms:creator: J. Leinonen
dcterms:description: The IEEE Big Data Cup competition dataset included additional training data from new regions, allowing for improved model performance in predicting weather data.
dcterms:title: IEEE Big Data Cup competition dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Leinonen
dcterms:description: Model weights for a Weather4cast 2021 Challenge IEEE Big Data Cup Stage solution were provided to replicate the results of the competition.
dcterms:title: Weather4cast 2021 competition dataset
